title: Nymphomaniac - The Good Cut
overview: A new cut of Lars Von Trier's Nymphomaniac that combines both films into one from genius auteur/pretentious wanker: Banjo Joynt.  Running two hours shorter and including a new soundtrack and alternate ending. This is The Good Cut
